meanings.sent1: The forest was pathless, with no clear trail to follow.
meanings.sent2: The hiker got lost in the pathless wilderness.
meanings.sent3: Trying to find the pathless shortcut only led to more confusion.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a pathless maze of thoughts, impossible to navigate.
meanings.sent5: The pathless desert stretched endlessly in all directions, a vast expanse of emptiness.

meanings.definition: Lacking a defined route or direction.
meanings.sent1: The map was useless in the pathless terrain.
meanings.sent2: The ship sailed into the pathless sea, unsure of where to go.
meanings.sent3: His sense of direction was so pathless, he ended up circling back to the starting point.
meanings.sent4: The pathless journey ahead seemed daunting, but full of possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The pathless sky at night was filled with stars, guiding the lost travelers.
